text: nidahase husma poda

wasara 28ka loka malala krida surathawali ithihasaye pirimi tharaga isawwaka awasan purwa watayata sudusukam labu prathama shri lankika kridakaya bawata pathwimata chaminda wijekon samathwiya.dakunu koriyawe dan pawathwena loka malala krida surathawaliye mitar 1500 tharaga isawwa niyojanaya kala aasiyanu malala krida surathawaliye padakkamlabhi chaminda wijekon mitar 1500 sudusukam labime tharagaya miniththu 3kuth thathpara 39.61kin tharagaya nima karamin nawa shri lanka warthawak bihikirimata samathwiya.mada dura dhawana sura chaminda wisin binda damanu labuwe pasugiya masaye japanaye kobe nuwaradi mitar 1500 tharaga isawwa miniththu 3kuth thathpara 40.78kin nima kota lokada padakkama dinaganimin pihita wu shri lanka warthawaya.emenma mitar 1500 tharaga isawwe miniththu 3.40 simawata wada aduwen ohu wisin nima karanu labu prathama awasthawada meya we.itha kadima kalagunika thaththwayan madhyaye mitar 1500 sudusukam labime palamu tharaga isawwa chaminda wisin nima karanu labuwe 11 wanna lesaya.“pasugiya wasara kipaya pura mama kenyawedi sarthaka puhunuwak labuwa.
